thread.title: NBA trade rumors: Magic Johnson terms Lakers' kids 'untouchables' | NBA | Sporting News
thread.title_full: NBA trade rumors: Magic Johnson terms Lakers' kids 'untouchables' | NBA | Sporting News

author: Tom Gatto
title: NBA trade rumors: Magic Johnson terms Lakers' kids 'untouchables' | NBA | Sporting News
text:
— Baxter Holmes (@BaxterHolmes) February 21, 2017 
Johnson sees the Lakers' rebuild as a long-term project, and any breakup of that under-25 group would run counter to that philosophy. Magic on Lakers: "I’m not going to [name] a time table, but it’s going to take some years to turn this around." 
VECENIE: Magic must learn limitations in new role 
The Lakers are working to unload veterans as Thursday's NBA trade deadline approaches. Reports on Tuesday said LA continues to discuss trades involving Lou Williams, Nick Young and Luol Deng. 
Johnson's reputation as an NBA personnel executive isn't the best ( see here ), but he seems to have the right approach as he begins his time as the leader of the front office. Watch This
